definitions.definition: To (officially) require someone to do something or act in a certain way, to give them the authority to do so; to command .
To administer or assign a territory to a nation under a mandate. (Can we add an example for this sense?)
To repeat , rehearse sermons or speeches aloud.

main_definition: To (officially) require someone to do something or act in a certain way, to give them the authority to do so; to command .
secondary_definitions: To administer or assign a territory to a nation under a mandate. (Can we add an example for this sense?)
( Scotland , especially Christianity ) To repeat , rehearse sermons or speeches aloud.
